name: Fragmentary Attic Black-Figure Band Cup
description: Fragmentary Attic Black-Figure Band Cup; Amasis, and signed by Amasis; Athens, Greece; about 550 - 540 B.C.; Terracotta; 8 × 22.1 cm (3 1/8 × 8 11/16 in.); 79.AE.197; Gift of George R. Stevenson; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Fragmentary Attic Black-Figure Band Cup
